entries.original: ddeabb1 fix(claude-code-hooks): handle UserPromptSubmit on first message properly
entries.translation: ddeabb1 fix(claude-code-hooks): 첫 번째 메시지에서 UserPromptSubmit을 올바르게 처리

entries.original: 7a896fd fix(token-limit-recovery): exclude thinking block errors from token limit detection
entries.translation: 7a896fd fix(token-limit-recovery): 토큰 제한 감지에서 생각 블록 오류 제외

entries.translation: 823f12d fix(todo-continuation-enforcer): 가장 가까운 메시지에서 모델/제공자 유지
